content:
{"name": "Project 658 - Nourish Up - Referral Required", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Labor Day Holiday Closure!
ALL OPERATIONS INCLUDING PANTRIES, MOBILE PANTRIES AND FOOD PHARMACIES, HOME DELIVERIES, FOOD SHARES, MEALS ON WHEELS DELIVERY, MAIN OFFICE AND WAREHOUSE WILL BE CLOSED Saturday, August 30 through Monday, September 1, 2025 in observance of Labor Day.
This is an emergency food pantry that requires a referral and an appointment. To have access to any of their pop-ups, you don't need a referral, ID or financial documents, but pre-registration is required to ensure there is enough food. You can find their upcoming pop-ups and register here: https://nourishup.org/foodshare/
**How To Get A Referral:**
To get a referral please have the following information ready for each person in the household:
▪ First and Last Name
▪ Date of Birth
▪ Phone Number (if available)
▪ Current Address
▪ Gender
▪ Ethnicity
▪ Veteran Status
▪ Receiving Food Stamps/SNAP**
▪ Household Income**
▪ Disability (Y or N)
▪ Email Address (if available)
▪ Date of Pick Up
▪ Preferred Pantry Location and secondary location in case the primary location is at capacity.
-No disribution on the 4th of July
you can call ahead to get a referal on 7045234333
Visit our website at https://nourishup.org/pantries/ under the food pantries tab for a PDF version of our location and hours.", "email": "", "url": "https://nourishup.org/pantries/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "3646 Central Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Commonwealth Park", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "28205", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.2146649, "longitude": -80.7828339}, "phones": [{"number": "(704) 733-9934", "type": "voice"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Referral Required. Lemontree can provide this referral. Please see the requirements in notes."}]}
